snippet: The pressure is on President Juan Manuel Santos to accelerate peace efforts after pinning his re-election on 18-month-old negotiations to end Colombia's half-century conflict....

headline.print_headline: Pressure on Santos to Reach Peace for Colombia
headline.main: Pressure on Santos to Reach Peace for Colombia

lead_paragraph: The pressure is on President Juan Manuel Santos to accelerate peace efforts after pinning his re-election on 18-month-old negotiations to end Colombia's half-century conflict.
